City of Dreams is a 2023 American-Mexican drama thriller film written and directed by Mohit Ramchandani, and stars Ari Lopez, Renata Vaca, Alfredo Castro, Paulina Gaitán, Jason Patric, and Diego Calva.
City of Dreams is scheduled to be released in the United States by Roadside Attractions on August 30, 2024.


Cast[edit]
Ari Lopez as Jesús
Alfredo Castro as El Jefe
Paulina Gaitán
Diego Calva as Carlitos
Renata Vaca as Elena
Jason Patric as Stevens
Production[edit]
In February 2023, it was reported that Yalitza Aparicio was going to serve as an executive producer on the American-Mexican drama thriller film titled Dreamers, and that Jason Patric had joined the cast.[1]
In October 2023, it was announced that Roadside Attractions had acquired the distribution rights to now-retitled City of Dreams, written and directed by Mohit Ramchandani in his directorial debut.[2]

Release[edit]
City of Dreams had its world premiere at the Mammoth Film Festival on March 5, 2023.[1] It was orginally scheduled to release in the United States on April 5, 2024, but it will now release August 30, 2024[2][3]

References[edit]


^ a b De la Fuente, Anna Marie (February 22, 2023). "Oscar-Nominated Yalitza Aparicio to Executive Produce Sweatshop Drama 'City of Dreams' with Infinity Hill (EXCLUSIVE)". Variety.

^ a b Grobar, Matt (October 3, 2023). "Roadside Attractions Sets Spring Release For 'City Of Dreams,' L.A. Sweatshop Thriller Exec Produced By 'Roma's Yalitza Aparicio". Deadline Hollywood.

^ "AMC Theaters".
